But genetic relationships don't mean nearly anything compared to the contin=
uation of the family/name.=C2=A0 My family has numerous adoptions, and they=
 make no difference whatsoever in the descent.=C2=A0 The survival of the cl=
an/name outweighs any sense of genetic descent.=C2=A0 Even on lineage chart=
s, those adopted ones appear just as if they were blood .. sometimes there =
may be a small footnote... sometimes not.

from =

name doesn't guarantee genetic relationships.
